requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

results.name: Testament: The Order of High Human

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1 version or newer, 64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel®Core i5-4460 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750ti or AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred), HDD (Supported), 720p/30 fps in Low Quality Settings without FSR enabled
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1 version or newer, 64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel®Core i7-7700K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD, 1080p/60 fps in Epic Quality Settings without FSR or DLSS enabled

Minimum:

  • Processor: from 2.9 GHz AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i5--10400F or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT, each with 8 GB VRAM or better

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: from 3.6 GHz, 8 cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 TI or AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT, each with 11 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or dedicated compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements mentioned here cannot cover all systems and configurations, so that in individual cases there may be compatibility problems that prevent or impact the game's runnability or performance.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended for fast loading. System requirements are an evaluation only and may vary. This game is solo developed and graphics are pushed to their limits. Old cards might not run or perform poorly.
